title: Public transport for Ladbrokes Cox Plate: Saturday 22 October 2022
articleContent:
Public transport for Ladbrokes Cox Plate: Saturday 22 October 2022

Extra public transport services are running for Ladbrokes Cox Plate: Saturday 22 October 2022. 

Gates open: 10.45am 

First race: 12.15pm

Last race 5.50pm  

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

From City (departing from Platform 10 at Flinders Street Station, towards Moonee Ponds Station):

  • 9.45am
  • 10.05am
  • 10.24am
  • 10.44am
  • 11.04am
  • 11.24am
  • 11.44am
  • 12.04pm
  • 12.24pm

To City (departing from Moonee Ponds Station):

  • 5.50pm
  • 6.11pm
  • 6.30pm
  • 6.51pm
  • 7.10pm
  • 7.31pm
  • 7.50pm

There will be a free shuttle service running between Moonee Ponds Station to the Racecourse and back. 

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from the Racecourse

Additional services along Route 59 tram, from 11am to 7pm from Moonee Ponds Junction (Stop 33) to Flinders / Elizabeth Streets (Stop 1).

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

PLEASE NOTE - Stop 34 – Moonee Ponds Civic Centre – will be CLOSED during 11:00am to 7:00pm. All passengers are advised to use Stop 33.
articleDescription: Public transport for Ladbrokes Cox Plate: Saturday 22 October 2022
